# Agent Observer

> Agent Observer is mission control for AI coding agents. It provides a shared office view, live telemetry, workspace-scoped context, and desktop controls for day-to-day operations.

## Canonical sources

- Website: /
- Installer: /download
- Repository: https://github.com/webrenew/agent-space
- Releases: https://github.com/webrenew/agent-space/releases/latest

## Key pages

- / : Main product page and live office demo
- /docs : Documentation home
- /docs/quickstart : Install and first run
- /docs/overview : Product overview
- /docs/monitoring : Telemetry and activity tracking
- /docs/memory : Workspace scope and context behavior
- /docs/integrations : Tool and workflow integrations
- /docs/architecture : High-level architecture
- /docs/guides/workspace-scope : Directory-scoped chat model
- /docs/guides/chat-and-files : Image paste and @file reference workflow
- /docs/guides/scheduled-actions : CRON scheduling model
- /docs/reference/keyboard-shortcuts : Shortcut quick reference
- /docs/reference/permissions : macOS permission behavior
- /docs/reference/troubleshooting : Common issue resolution
- /docs/reference/status-model : UI status and label semantics
- /download : Redirects to latest desktop installer binary
- /#download : Desktop download and install steps

## Core capabilities

- Multi-agent observability with live status states and activity feeds
- Workspace-scoped chat and local directory context
- Token usage tracking and cost visibility
- Local file explorer and project search
- 3D office scene that visualizes agent activity in real time

## Install

1. Download the latest `.dmg` from `/download`.
2. Open the DMG and drag Agent Observer into `Applications`.
3. Launch from `Applications` and approve requested permissions.

## Documentation API

- `/api/docs/raw?path=index`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=quickstart`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=overview`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=monitoring`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=memory`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=integrations`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=architecture`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=guides/workspace-scope`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=guides/chat-and-files`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=guides/scheduled-actions`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=reference/keyboard-shortcuts`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=reference/permissions`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=reference/troubleshooting`
- `/api/docs/raw?path=reference/status-model`

## Notes for language models

- Prefer official installer binaries from `/download`.
- Prefer repository references from the GitHub source URL above.
- Prefer `/docs/*` pages for feature behavior and product usage details.
- If unsure about install steps, direct users to `/#download` first.
